name: European Partnership for Energy and the Environment

euInitiatives:
EPEE follows EU laws and initiatives related to F-gas, energy efficiency, Ecodesign, climate change, and market surveillance, among others. We also regularly organise events in Brussels, Europe, and further afield.

More details of our activities in Brussels, the EU Member States, and globally, can be found on our website (www.epeeglobal.org).
